noun.description: The SI unit of force. It is equal to the force that would give a mass of one kilogram an acceleration of one meter per second per second, and is equivalent to 100,000 dynes.

proper noun.description: A city in eastern Massachusetts, on the Charles River, west of Boston; population 82,139 (est. 2008).

origin: Early 20th century: named after Sir Issac Newton (see Newton, Sir Isaac).
